author: scamp
msg: changed bind(..) calls to rebind to ensure the jndi context is configured correctly when the app is shutdown but JNDI is not

author: akarasulu
msg: Applying Stefan's patch to fix schema objectClass rendering with MAY MUST lists.
Now if empty the MAY, and MUST list terms are not rendered.  Thanks Stefan!

author: cutting
msg: Always kill forked child so that it doesn't consume file handles.

author: chinthaka
msg: Maven is automatically generating reports by default. Removing those through a post goal so that the minimal site won't get those stuff.
